item.title: [Python] ChIP-seq analysis starting from scratch
item.description: #Introduction ChIP-seq (chromatin immunoprecipitation followed by sequencing) is a method to comprehensively measure at which position on the genome the binding and histone modification of a specific transcription factor and how often it occurs. You will be able to start from the environment construction, analyze using the data of the paper, and finally see the results in the genome browser and make peak calls ~. Let’s start with the environment construction immediately!
